programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: Joe is only 30 years old and trapped in an 800-lb body. He lost his job and is mostly housebound. Now, Joe needs to find the strength to face his past and save his life.

programme.title: Addicted to Marriage
programme.desc: After the bombshell that Shae dropped on Joe about her past relationships, Joe is still ready to surprise her. Amy and Geno go ring shopping. Kecia and Ernst have their own version of a fairy-tale ending.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A young pregnant woman in labour begs the ER doctor to keep her pregnancy and delivery a secret from her father. Twins share similar, confusing symptoms. A man with no pulse or blood pressure is still alive and breathing, mystifying his doctors.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A patient is brought to the ER with a live shark clamped onto his thigh.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A pregnant woman is shot in the abdomen but refuses testing and treatment, jeopardizing her and the baby's lives. A doctor is the victim of a car burglary, and thinks her patient may be the culprit. A storm is preventing a patient's life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Untold Stories of the ER
programme.desc: A woman risks losing her finger after trying on an ill-fitting engagement ring. A body builder can't breathe and doctors are shocked to discover why. A doctor takes a break outside and is nearly struck by a car driven by her next patient.

programme.title: I Am Jazz
programme.desc: Jazz's siblings challenge her to lose weight and start socializing again. The Jennings plan a surprise Father's Day event for Greg. Jazz's social anxiety is put to the test when she attends her first mixer in over two years and runs into an old flame.

programme.title: I Am Jazz
programme.desc: As Jazz continues on her weight loss journey, she learns she isn't the only woman in her family who has struggled with eating issues. Sander is interested in dating a Trans woman, and things get heated with Jazz and her siblings as they prepare dinner.

programme.title: I Am Jazz
programme.desc: Jazz plans a rally for Black Trans Lives with Peppermint as the headliner. When Sander finds out his date hasn't had gender affirmation surgery, he finds himself questioning their potential for intimacy. Meanwhile, Jeanette cuts loose over cocktails.

programme.title: I Am Jazz
programme.desc: Jazz's rally for Black Trans Lives is in jeopardy after her main speaker drops out. Sander goes on a second date with Hope and is surprised to learn about some of her dating criteria. Jazz confronts TS Madison about her comments on Jazz's mental health.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Wardens Richards and Roraback attend an accident.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: On the Gulf of Mexico, a routine inspection turns treacherous for Game Warden Carmen Rickel and the Marine Tactical Operations Group. Warden Kyle Hadley wrangles a rattlesnake found in a home, and underaged boaters are busted for alcohol on deck.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Suspicions flare when stray bullets strike an elderly couple's home and their neighbors are questioned. Game Wardens Raj Ataya and Clint Caywood rush to help an injured boater, and an overnight kayak patrol reveals campers throwing caution to the wind.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: During a routine hunting license check, husband and wife Game Wardens Ben and Chelsea Bailey discover illegal drugs. Trespassers get caught in a dangerous restricted area, and Warden James Cummings races to track down a man threatening self-harm.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Wardens Matt Kiel and Michael Serbanic race to confront reckless jet skiers wreaking havoc at a boat ramp. A rogue ATV rider tries to lie his way out of a trespassing charge, and a crabber turns hostile when caught without a fishing license.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Foolhardy speedsters run afoul of wardens on a nighttime stakeout mission. Game Warden Mike Boone investigates reckless gunfire endangering life and property, and Game Warden Chelsea Bailey crosses paths with a wanted man during a routine safety check.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Wardens Mike Boone and James Noxon question a felon suspected of illegally hunting with a firearm. Hunters are tracked down and interrogated after a suspicious sighting on private property, and a late-night shrimp boat search uncovers illegal fish.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Wardens Morgan Inman and Justin Eddins interrogate a group of hunters suspected of trespassing and theft. Lifeless ducks are found floating mysteriously in Port Aransas, and wardens hit the water before dawn to bust clandestine shrimpers.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: Deep in the woods and bayous of Louisiana, Wildlife Agents protect the state's resources. A crab fisherman is caught stealing dozens of traps, a hunter crosses state lines with an illegal deer, and Agents rescue an injured bald eagle.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: In Jackson Parish, a reckless hunter is investigated for shooting down a highway. Meanwhile, Agents stake out a man suspected of two illegal deer kills, duck hunters are confronted for harassment and a crowded boat parade ends with citations.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: In Southern Louisiana, Lt. David Nunez and Sgt. Austin Arteaga investigate a group of bird hunters on opening day of Teal Season. Later, a repeated offender is busted for taking immature crabs and a late-night deer decoy leads to a hunter in handcuffs.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: While using the LDWF's 'spy-in-the-sky' drone, Agents track down a boat captain breaking the law in Plaquemines Parish. A family of shrimpers is investigated for pulling oversized nets, and two feuding fishermen are suspected of being under the influence.

programme.title: Louisiana Law
programme.desc: As a storm rolls in over St. Tammany Parish, Cpl. Blaine Wagner and Cpl. Rick Clark assist in a search and rescue mission for a missing fisherman. Agents confront a repeat offender for harassing hunters and a felon is caught with an illegal firearm.

programme.title: Louisiana Law

programme.desc: Team Reliable is in the thick of foggy chaos. Ken turns an off road recovery into a joyride. Greg takes charge on his biggest recovery without the boss. Gord hustles to open the Coq's steepest stretch. Prized iron gets a new look.

programme.title: Heavy Rescue: 401
programme.desc: A courier truck rolls over; a vicious storm puts Abrams driver Mark in the middle of a crash zone on the 401; the crew dives for cover during an icy airbag job.

programme.title: This Came Out of Me
programme.desc: Dr. Ruby Rose and her medical colleagues are presented with an assortment of emergency cases, including a patient with dangerously swollen genitalia, a small toy stuck in a toddler's nose and a mechanic who has impaled his hand with a sharp tool.

programme.title: Bones

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A man falls 52 stories and his body goes missing after it hits the ground. With no body to process, the CSIs must treat this strange development as a missing persons case.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The most exclusive jewellery auction of the year ends abruptly when an appraiser is killed during the event. The investigation takes an emotional turn when the CSIs must confront one the greatest tragedies in human history, the Holocaust.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: A Boeing 737 is engulfed in flames on the tarmac, and the disaster leaves an international team of investigators with a troubling question.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: A semi plows off a bridge, leaving a trailer and three RVs dangling over a raging river. John must get holiday traffic moving and prove himself on a multi-part recovery unlike anything they've faced.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Al Quiring races to recover a trailer and open the TransCanada before the morning rush. Jamie runs a race of his own when a semi carrying a load of pharmaceuticals plunges down a bank. In Alberta, the burdens of running the shop solo take a toll on Colin.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The team identifies the remains of a victim after an explosion but discover the man they thought was dead is actually alive. Meanwhile, Booth takes on a desk assignment so Sweets is given a temporary partner.

programme.desc: Transporting the gear of Formula E's ten electric-powered racing teams to cities around the world across more than 50,000 total kilometres in the greenest way imaginable is no easy task. For air transport, DHL uses Boeing 747 or 777 aircraft.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: The C-2 Greyhound's design allows it a flexibility and access that few other fixed wing craft possess. For the U.S. Navy, it provides critical logistics support, flying 1,000 miles in a matter of hours and transporting high-priority cargo.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: Follow the Stargazer carrier on its latest quest, taking to the sky to launch the Pegasus rocket delivering specialized weather satellites designed to detect the magnitude and intensity of hurricanes.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: Baffinland Mines needs to get equipment to a remote mine in Nunavut to support shipping operations for the summer and have hired one of Volga-Dnepr's Ilyushin-76 (Il-76) aircraft to take on this timely operation.

programme.title: Mighty Planes
programme.desc: The German Air Force is overhauling their entire fleet of outdated cargo planes, and replacing them with Airbus? Latest state-of-the-art military aircraft, the A400M, which can haul massive loads.

programme.title: Mighty Planes

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: Investigate aspects of safety when a Greek ferry en route between Athens and the Island of Paros smashes into a rock and sinks. Killing 80 people, the crash has left many wondering how the vessel hit a rock that raises 25 metres out of the sea.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: A freight train rumbling through the calm suburb of San Bernardino, California, derails and crashed, destroying homes and taking lives. Less than two weeks later a pipeline, weakened in the cleanup of the derailment, explodes.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: When a hijacked Ethiopian Airlines flight runs out of fuel near the Comoros Island, a pilot must save the lives of the passengers. The pilot, who has been hijacked twice before, must rely on his skills as the plane plunges toward the sea from 31,000 feet.

programme.title: Mayday
programme.desc: In 1977, two fully loaded jumbo airliners suffer 583 casualties despite never leaving the ground at foggy Los Rodeos Airport in the Canary Islands.

programme.desc: On August 2, 2005 Air France flight 358 burst into flames when it skidded off the runway in Toronto during a raging thunderstorm. More that 300 passengers and crew had only seconds to escape the burning plane.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Mariah searches for a homeless woman needing to surrender her beloved pit bull. Tania and Toney find the perfect pair of dogs for former adopters, while Lizzy prepares her favorite rescue for a forever home after dealing with his medical issues.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Toney and Earl rescue an aggressive dog found tied up in front of an abandoned home. Tia and Lizzy escort a pit bull to its potential forever home in New Jersey, while Mariah helps a deserted canine struggling with neurological issues.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia and M2 welcome back a couple who want to reunite their adoptee with her former best friend. Mariah and Tony discover a hound in desperate shape, while Mariah does everything in her power to nurse VRC's first Louisiana rescue back to health.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: The Villalobos crew celebrates 200 episodes and recount precious memories. From Mariah's beauty pageant days, to memorable rescues, like Walter and Buffy. They reminisce on what it was like to film and the highs and lows of living the rescue life.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tragedy strikes after Tia and M2 agree to take two emaciated hounds from a rural shelter. Mariah and Lizzy give two special dogs a happily ever after while working through the chaos of the global pandemic, and M2 reveals an exciting new life chapter.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia and M2 face tragedy after agreeing to take two emaciated hounds from a rural shelter. Mariah and Lizzy give two special dogs a happy ending while working through the chaos of the global pandemic, and M2 reveals an exciting new life chapter.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: When over 50 hybrid hounds are found abandoned in Texas, Tia is faced with her most challenging rescue to date and is determined to find the best solution before it's too late. At Villalobos, Tania and Mariah help a lonely man adopt a furever friend.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: In the midst of the global pandemic, Tia and Mariah must shut down their beloved restaurant and boutique, but look to a new beginning. Meanwhile, a Villalobos senior canine veteran finally finds a forever home.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Nearly a year has passed since beloved parolee Earl's run-in with the law. Earl and Toney join forces to rescue a canine from an abandoned home, while Mariah is forced to make a difficult decision for her fur-baby Tater.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Nearly a year has passed since beloved parolee Earl's run-in with the law. Earl and Toney join forces to rescue a canine from an abandoned home, while Mariah is forced to make a difficult decision for her fur-baby Tater.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: After rescuing 30 hybrid wolf-dogs, Tia, Tania, and the twins return to Texas. In the French Quarter, the pandemic has forced Tia to shut down her restaurant, and Toney and Earl band together to deliver meals to the elderly using Tahyo Tavern's resources.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Facing new challenges, the VRC crew gets creative: Tia leads a virtual meet-and-greet with a lovable hound, Mariah helps the parolees channel their talents for a fundraiser, and a lucky pit bull learns a new skill for life with an outdoorsy couple.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: VRC is at its limit when the amount of rescues and drop-offs rise. Lizzy and Toney travel to a remote part of the city to save a trio of orphaned dogs in a dire state, veteran tenant Lil Rocky faces a cancer scare, and a litter of puppies are welcomed.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Now a mother of two, Lizzy leans on Tia to help find a work-life balance. A California couple hopes to adopt a dog comfortable in the pool, and Mariah's mission to save an injured dog abandoned in the rain leads her to something completely unexpected.

programme.desc: At a Mississippi shelter, Tia gives a hybrid wolf-dog a second chance. At the vet, Lizzy is forced to make a tough call for a new VRC resident and later helps a pair of hearing impaired canines. Then, a California man visits to find a fur-friend.

programme.desc: Goldendoodle Tahoe helps a paraplegic man with his mobility and daily tasks. After all other treatments failed, a veteran with PTSD receives successful therapy from an Appaloosa horse named Captain Jack Sparrow.

programme.sub-title: Greg and the Parrots / Noah and Riley
programme.desc: A U.S. war veteran diagnosed with PTSD finds solace in rescue parrots Bella and Chico.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A confrontation between enemies turns deadly, and Lt. Joe Kenda's best hope for answers lies with a grainy, dubbed-over surveillance tape. Then An elderly man is fighting for his life. Was it a slip-and-fall, or something infinitely more disturbing?

programme.desc: A budding teen romance ends when the young man is shot dead on their first date leaving a startled girl as the key to the case. Then A man is dead, his young wife has fled, and Kenda must figure out if she was present for his suicide or his murder.

programme.desc: A meeting between two businessmen leaves one shot in the face. Things seem cut and dry until Lt. Kenda realizes the 'victim' could actually be the aggressor, shot struggling over his own gun. The key to the case lies in the deal they were discussing.

programme.desc: A loving, churchgoing grandmother is found stabbed to death in her apartment, leaving Joe Kenda to wonder what sort of monster could do such a thing. Then When Kenda investigates the mysterious death of a successful dentist, the case gets personal.

programme.desc: When two escaped inmates surface in Colorado Springs, it's up to Lt. Joe Kenda and his Fugitive Unit to bring them to justice. Then Police break up a domestic dispute and find a body in the bedroom.

programme.desc: When a soon-to-be grandmother doesn't come home from work, her daughter knows something terrible must have happened and reports her missing. As the investigation unfolds, Lt. Joe Kenda realizes they could be dealing with a fledgling serial killer.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Events earlier in the day lead to a card game halted by gunfire and a young man's death. Also, when Lt. Joe Kenda responds to a double shooting, he and his team find themselves reminiscing.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A four-week-old girl is kidnapped, leaving her mother in anguish and police scrambling to find her. As days go by with no sign of the baby or demands for ransom, sergeants Joe Kenda and Robert Sapp fear she's been sold on the black market or worse.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A woman's mangled body is found beside a lonely stretch of highway. When the coroner suspects foul play, Kenda is called in to solve the second homicide case of his career.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: The discovery of a family home littered with corpses tasks Kenda with unspooling the paranoid obsessions of a diseased mind, and forces him to confront his greatest fear. Then a deadly beating a cheap motel illuminates the dark underbelly of love.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Blood evidence is used in investigating the shooting death of a firearms enthusiast.

programme.desc: Two teens stumble upon a woman engulfed in flames, leaving detectives to wonder just who in her inner circle could kill so cruelly. Then, when a college student is strangled in his home, Lt. Kenda must figure out which of his roommates is lying.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A hostage situation puts Sgt. Joe Kenda and his team to the test, as they try to save a family without getting shot themselves.

programme.desc: A sharp-dressed pedestrian is shot in the back for unknown reasons. Chasing a promising lead, Kenda realizes he's barking up the wrong tree. Then when an impromptu argument turns fatal, a suspect's guilt boils down to his skill with deadly weapons.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When an Air Force veteran dies unexpectedly, Kenda and his team must determine if it was a tragic accident or premeditated murder. But before long, they discover that their clean-cut victim had a secret life.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Hikers stumble onto the brutalized corpse of amateur boxer Johnnie Wilson, hidden beneath a pile of branches. Plagued by false starts and blind alleys, the case finally gains traction when investigators get their hands dirty.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: An unhinged divorcee with a score to settle initiates an armed standoff from the cramped confines of his trailer park. Then a disabled man is killed on the job, but Kenda's case hits a roadblock when forensic evidence is scrubbed from the scene.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Two best friends are gunned down on a dark residential street. When a string of disappointments threaten to derail the case, Kenda enlists the help of an old acquaintance.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A woman in red drops a dying man off at a firehouse and then vanishes. Police soon learn the victim is a contractor with a troubled personal life, but identifying the mystery woman is the hurdle they must overcome in order to bring him justice.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a frantic 9-1-1 call reports an infant stopped breathing, Kenda and Walker must see if the daycare is to blame or the parents themselves. Then, Kenda works an execution-style shooting and is shocked to learn the victim is a kindly grandmother.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A young man is found dead behind the wheel of his taxi. With robbery seeming unlikely, Kenda and Gaenzle wonder if this was personal. Could this stem from a dispute at his other job as a radio DJ? A failing marriage? The possibilities seem endless.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: One is dead and two are in critical condition, and it's up to Kenda and Barry to find out why a gun battle occurred in a quaint family home.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When two young men are found shot in an apartment hallway, Kenda must rely on his inner lie detector to figure out which victim was no victim at all. Then, police investigate a murder in broad daylight and nearly get killed themselves.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: High in the mountains above Colorado Springs, a woman's frozen body is found along a switchback road. Before investigators can determine who's responsible for her death, they'll need to figure out what brought her here in the first place.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: After a man is brutally gunned down in the middle of the street, Kenda must piece together a puzzle of conflicting stories and dead ends. Then, a bloody body is discovered in a popular mall and Kenda must make sense of the gruesome and mysterious scene.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Hikers come across a horrific scene: a dead man left nude, beaten and bound in the mountain wilderness. But when the young victim's checkered past is uncovered, Kenda must wade through a laundry list of potential suspects to find the man's killer.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: After a father is found shot in front of his home, Kenda uncovers a vengeful motive behind a deadly family feud. Then, a church of God turns into a house of horrors as officers face a life-or-death decision when confronted by a knife-wielding psychopath.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a young woman is found mysteriously slaughtered on the steps of a trailer, Kenda and the homicide team must track down the vile perpetrators responsible for a horrifying string of cold-blooded murders.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a beloved grandmother is found stabbed to death in her own home, Kenda must turn to a tight-knit community still grieving from the tragic loss. After 12 years of searching, they finally uncover the fiendish plot to exploit the helpless victim.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Kenda faces his most difficult case yet the slaying of a young boy. After confronting his own demons brought forth by the tragic case, the detective makes the most consequential decision of his career.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Hard-working fast food manager Missy Berry was found dead in an idling car at a deserted intersection.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a bloody shooting in front of a high school leaves 14-year-old J.L. Jackson dead, Kenda uncovers a deadly vendetta stemming from a heated lunchroom confrontation.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When police found the lifeless bodies of Sophia Gerardo, four children and a house cat, they suspected a ritualistic mass murder, but Lt. Joe Kenda uncovered a reality far more frightening and deadly than anyone could have imagined.

programme.title: Stone House Revival

programme.title: Stone House Revival
programme.desc: Jeff gets to work adding tons of historic charm to a home's crumbling facade and transforming its dining room with a custom-built mud-room nook.

programme.title: Stone House Revival

programme.title: Stone House Revival
programme.desc: Jeff Devlin is tasked with turning a couple's wide-open front porch into an enclosed mud room that blends the 1740s stone portion of their home with the 1800s wood siding portion; he uncovers a stone fireplace while restoring their large living room.

programme.title: Stone House Revival

programme.title: Barnwood Builders

programme.title: Barnwood Builders

programme.title: Barnwood Builders
programme.desc: Tammy and her late husband dreamed of running a craft store in a log cabin on their West Virginia family homestead; Mark and the guys help Tammy build the cabin, making some homemade crafts and visiting a pioneer landmark along the way.

programme.title: Barnwood Builders

programme.title: Barnwood Builders

programme.title: Barnwood Builders
